SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class DatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.DatabaseConnector
public class DatabaseConnector extends Object
The DatabaseConnector class is responsible for managing the connection to the H2 database, initializing tables, and handling operations related to Hotels, Rooms, Users, and Reservations.
Author:
Alexander Boutselis

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public static void connect()
      Connects to the H2 database and creates the necessary tables if they do not exist.

    • disconnect

      public static void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the H2 database.

    • getHandle

      public static org.jdbi.v3.core.Handle getHandle()
      Gets the current Handle for database operations. Connects to the database if the handle is null.
      Returns:
      The Handle object for executing database operations.

    • generateDefaultState

      public static void generateDefaultState(int numOfRooms)
      Initializes default data for the application on the first app run.
      Parameters:
      numOfRooms - number of rooms to create by default.

    • initializeApplication

      public static void initializeApplication()
      Initializes the application by connecting to the database and checking if the database contains any data. If no data is found, it initializes default data.

    • createTables

      public static void createTables()
      Creates all the required tables in the H2 database if they do not exist.

    • createHotelsTable

      public static void createHotelsTable()
      Creates the Hotels table in the database if it does not exist.

    • addHotel

      public static void addHotel(Hotel hotel)
      Adds a new hotel to the database.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The hotel object to be added.

      Parameters:

      Adds a new reservation to the database.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The reservation object to be added.

    • updateHotelInDatabase

      public static boolean updateHotelInDatabase(Hotel hotel)
      Updates an existing hotel in the database.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The hotel object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateRoomInDatabase

      public static boolean updateRoomInDatabase(Room room)
      Updates an existing room in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - The room object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

      idColumnName - the name of the column containing the IDs
      Returns:

      public static void translateFromDatabase()
      Translates data from the database into application objects.

    • translateHotelFromDatabase

      public static Hotel translateHotelFromDatabase(int hotelID)
      Translates a hotel from the database into a Hotel object.
      Parameters:
      hotelID - the ID of the hotel to translate
      Returns:
      the Hotel object corresponding to the hotelID

    • translateRoomFromDatabase

      public static Room translateRoomFromDatabase(int roomId)
      Translates a room from the database into a Room object.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to translate
      Returns:
      the Room object corresponding to the roomId

      Returns:
      the User object corresponding to the userId

      Returns:
      the Reservation object corresponding to the reservationId

    • deleteDatabaseFile

      public static void deleteDatabaseFile()
      Deletes the database file from the user's home directory.

    • dropTable

      public static void dropTable(String tableName)
      Drops the specified table from the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to drop

    • emptyTable

      public static void emptyTable(String tableName)
      Deletes all rows from the specified table and resets its auto-increment value.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to empty

    • emptyDatabase

      public static void emptyDatabase()
      Deletes all data from all tables in the database and resets auto-increment values.

    • removeObjectFromDatabase

      public static void removeObjectFromDatabase(String itemType, int id)
      Removes a specific object (Hotel, Room, User, Manager, or Reservation) from the database by its ID and resets the auto-increment value.
      Parameters:
      itemType - the type of the item to remove (can be "Hotel", "Room", "User", "Manager", or "Reservation")
      id - the ID of the item to remove

    • removeItemFromDatabase

      public static void removeItemFromDatabase(Object item)
      Removes a specific item (Hotel, Room, User, Manager, or Reservation) from the database.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to remove (can be Hotel, Room, User, Reservation, or Manager)

    • printAllTables

      public static void printAllTables()
      Prints all Tables in the database

      public static void printHotelsTable()
      Prints all rows of the Hotels table in a formatted manner to the terminal.

      public static void printRoomsTable()
      Prints all rows of the Rooms table in a formatted manner to the terminal.

      public static void printUsersTable()
      Prints all rows of the Users table in a formatted manner to the terminal.
